name: Crop Circles Puzzle
description:
A game developed especially for ufos, crop circles and puzzles enthusiasts. A theme that fascinates, intrigues, attracts
attention and stirs the imagination of so many people.


- A mysterious, immersive and minimalist experience.

- Tap to spin the pieces and solve the puzzle.

- Stay tuned! Small parts make some levels more difficult.

- Instigating, mysterious! Are you able to discover the messages and the hidden meaning of each circle?

- Solve the puzzles and find out where and when the circles appeared.

- Discover great pictures.

- Addictive, intuitive, relaxing and easy to play. Develop your focus and attention!

- No ADS / without additional purchases


Crop Circles Puzzle is a minimalist game based on the mysterious forms that have appeared for decades in plantations around the world, especially
in England. There are incredible cases, where giant and complex forms appeared from one hour to another, near roads and inhabited places.
Who created them is still a great mystery.

Ideal to pass the time, Crop Circles Puzzle is extremely relaxing and provides a mysterious and immersive experience.
The combination of enigmatic and soft music with intriguing images builds a perfect environment to escape the stressful situations of everyday.
Addictive and intuitive, Crop Circles Puzzle will take you on a journey towards mystical places.
Are you able to discover the messages and the hidden meaning of each circle?


You will love Crop Circles Puzzle:

-100 incredible levels
-Without stopwatch or pressure
-Develop your focus and attention
-Simple and fun: fit the pieces correctly and solve the mystery
-Fantastic and mysterious images
-Relaxing music and environment
-Instructive: complete the forms to know when and where they appeared
-Addictive. You always want to solve a new mystery, find out what the next image is
-Without advertisements or additional purchases



How to play Crop Circles Puzzle?
The goal is simple. To complete the level, tap the parts to rotate and engage. Look for the perfect fit and complete intriguing images.
When all the pieces are connected and the level is completed, images that will open your mind will emerge and then you will know the place and
year the crop circle have appeared. Stay tuned! Small parts make some levels more difficult. Always look for the perfect links between shapes.


Is it possible to save game progress?
The progress of the game will be instantly recorded in your application. So you can return in the exact level
in which stopped playing. If you encounter any difficulties, please contact us and we will try to solve it.


Do I need to pay to play?
Crop Circles Puzzle costs the price of a coffee and you can enjoy a clean version of the game without annoying ads or additional purchases.


Take the challenge and solve this mystery!


Have fun with Crop Circles Puzzle!
